purpleculture_examples:
泥潭 [ ní tán ]: quagmire
水潭 [ shuǐ tán ]: puddle; pool
一潭死水 [ yī tán sǐ shuǐ ]: a pool of stagnant water; stagnant or listless condition
龙潭虎穴 [ lóng tán hǔ xué ]: danger spot (idiom)
日月潭 [ rì yuè tán ]: Sun Moon Lake in Nantou County, Taiwan

heisig_chinese_memo: In the old west people had pools because it was so hot so when they woke up early some would choose to bathe in the deep pool instead of the shower. &nbsp

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the early western (覃) water (氵) is deep
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the old west people had pools because it was so hot so when they woke up early some would choose to bathe in the deep pool instead of the shower. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " tan " sound. " Tan " is the name of the water, which is now Liujiang, in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region. "Shuowen": "Pan, water, out of Wuling Yuan to become Yushan, east into Yulin. From water, Tansheng." Such as "Han Shu. "Geography": "Yu Mountain, out of the lake, east to Alin into Yu, cross Jun 2 and travel 720 miles."

" Tan " means deep water and abyss. "Guang Ya. "Shi Shui": "Tan, Yuan Ye." Such as "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Thinking": "Nagase turbulent flow, tracing the river and pond." Wang Yi's note: "Tan, Yuan also. The name of the Chu was called Yuan." Tang Dynasty Li Bai "Gift to Wang Lun": "The peach blossom pond is a thousand feet deep, not as deep as Wang Lun sent. I love."

" Tan " by extension means deep and profound. Such as "Pipe. Extravagance": "Tan roots are not cut, solid matters are not to enter." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Tan, deep is also." Tang Dynasty Han Yu "Fu Shushu Chengnan": "One is the public and the Xiang, the residence of the Tantan Mansion." "Tantan" means profound appearance.

" Tan " is commonly used as " xun ", which means waterside. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. "Father of the Fisherman": "Qu Yuan has been released, swimming in the river pond, walking on the banks of the Yinze River, the color is haggard, described as withered." Song Baozhao of the Southern Dynasty "Gift to Fu Du Cao Bie": "Qinghong plays Jiangtan, lonely geese Jizhou."
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " tan " sound. " Tan " is the name of the water, which is now the Liujiang River, and later generally refers to the deep water and the abyss.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「覃」聲。「潭」是水名，即今柳江，在廣西壯族自治區內。《說文》：「潭，水，出武陵鐔成玉山，東入鬱林。从水，覃聲。」如《漢書．地理志》：「玉山，潭水所出，東至阿林入鬱，過郡二，行七百二十里。」

　　「潭」表示深水、深淵。《廣雅．釋水》：「潭，淵也。」如《楚辭．九章．抽思》：「長瀨湍流，泝江潭兮。」王逸注：「潭，淵也。楚人名淵曰潭。」唐代李白〈贈汪倫〉：「桃花潭水深千尺，不及汪倫送我情。」

　　「潭」引申表示深、深邃。如《管子．侈靡》：「潭根之毋伐，固事之毋入。」尹知章注：「潭，深也。」唐代韓愈〈符讀書城南〉：「一為公與相，潭潭府中居。」「潭潭」表示深邃貌。

　　「潭」通作「潯」，表示水邊。如《楚辭．漁父》：「屈原既放，游於江潭，行吟澤畔，顏色憔悴，形容枯槁。」南朝宋鮑照〈贈傅都曹別〉：「輕鴻戲江潭，孤雁集洲沚。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「覃」聲。「潭」是水名，即今柳江，後泛指深水、深淵。

潭
Pinyin: tán
English Definition: deep pool; pond; pit (dialect); depression
Total strokes: 15; Radical: 水
Pictophonetic: 覃 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 覃 [ tán ] to reach, to spread to; deep, extensive

潭字的基本解释

潭
tán
水深之处：深潭。泥潭。水潭。
深：潭渊。潭潭（宽深，宽大）。潭思（深思。亦作“覃思”）。

潭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tán］
［《廣韻》徒含切，平覃，定。］
(1)深水池。
(2)深；深邃。
(3)象声词。参见“潭潭”。
(4)见“潭沲”。
[②]［xún］
［《集韻》徐心切，平侵，邪。］
水边；水边深处。

潭字的英文翻译

◎ 潭
deep pool, pond

潭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潭； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页650第13
【唐韻】【正韻】徒含切【集韻】【韻會】徒南切，?音覃。水名。【說文】水出武陵鐔成玉山。　又深也。【前漢·揚雄傳】潭思渾天。　又州名。【廣輿記】長沙府，隋唐曰潭州。　又【集韻】【正韻】?徐心切，音尋。旁深也。與潯同。【揚雄·解嘲】或橫江潭而漁。　又【集韻】【正韻】?夷針切，音淫。浸潭，與浸淫同。【司馬相如·上林賦】浸潭促節。【漢書】作浸淫。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?以荏切，音?。潭濼，水動搖貌。或作藫?。　又【集韻】忍甚切，音荏。義同。

考證：〔【說文】水出武陵潭成玉山。〕　謹照原文潭改鐔。
潭字的源字形

潭字的起名意思

：深，深邃；水深之处。

tán
Water depth: deep pool. Quagmire. Waterhole.
Deep: Tan Yuan. Tantan (wide, deep, wide). Tan Si (thinking deeply. Also known as "Tin Si").

[①]［tán］
["Guangyun" Tu Hanqie, Pingtan, Ding. ]
(1) Deep pool.
(2) Deep; profound.
(3) Onomatopoeia. See "Tan Tan".
(4) See "Tan Gao".
[②]［xún］
["Ji Yun" Xu Xinqi, flat invasion, evil. ]
The water's edge; deep in the water's edge.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　 Tan; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 650 13
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Tu Hanqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Tu Nanqie,? Yin Tan. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Wuling to become Yushan.　It's also deep. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Tan Siyuntian.　Also the name of the state. [Guang Yu Ji] Changsha Mansion, Tanzhou in Sui and Tang Dynasties.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Xu Xinqie, find the sound. The side is also deep. Same as Xun. [Yang Xiong·Interpretation] Or fishing in the lake.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? The needle is cut, the sound is lewd. Soaking in the pool is the same as soaking. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Soaking in the lake to promote festivals. [Han] for soaking.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Cut with Nun, sound?. Tanluo, the water is shaking. Or for 藫?.　[Jiyun] Tolerant and cut, sound. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Said the text] Water flows out of Wuling Lake to become Yushan. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text.

Name meaning
: Deep, deep; where the water is deep.
潭
会意字。从水(氵),古文字形体像一道流水,表示潭是深水池;从覃,覃有深义,表示潭是深水池;罩(tan)兼表声。本
义是深水池。
①深水池:清~「古~「龙~虎穴。2坑:泥~。③深:~
井1~思。
~水 古~ 泥~ 水~ 龙~虎穴
tán
潭潭
Пруд
Зная слово.
Конгшуй (氵), древние иероглифы подобны потоку воды, что указывает на то, что бассейн - это глубокий бассейн; Congtan, Tan имеет глубокое значение, что означает, что бассейн является глубоким бассейном; покрытие (tan) также выражает звук.
Первоначальное значение - глубокий бассейн.
①Глубокий бассейн: Цин ~ "Древний ~" Дракон ~ Пещера Тигра. 2 Яма: Грязь ~. ③Глубокий: ~ Колодец 1 ~ Мышление. ~ Вода Древний ~ Грязь ~ Вода ~ Дракон ~ Пещера Тигра
Тан Тан
tán, xún, yín
I прил. /наречие
1) глубокий, скрытый
潭根 глубокие корни
潭思 глубоко продумывать
2) эпист. Ваш
II сущ.
1) пучина, бездна; омут; заводь
潭鱼 рыба из омута
2) яма выбивания (под водопадом)
3) берег
江潭 берег реки
III собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 潭水) Таньшуй (река в пров. Хунань)
2) tán Тань (фамилия)
